00054 const char cftpmod::_id[] = "ftp";
00055 const char cftpmod::_conf[] = "<ftp/><desc><ftp/></desc>";
00056 const char cftpmod::_name[] = "";
00057 
00058 const char * cftpmod::conf() {
00059   return ! (sessb.ai.flags &cvq::admin) ? "" : _conf;
00060 }
00061 
00065 cftpmod::cftpmod( cenvironment & env ) : cmod(env) {
00066   modinfo = sessb.ai.flags & cvq::admin ? mi_conf : 0;
00067 }
00068 /****************************************************************************
00069  * 
00070  * **************************************************************************/
00071 void cftpmod::rmspace(string &s) {
00072  string::iterator ptr=s.begin(), end=s.end();
00073  while( ptr != end ) {
00074    if( isspace(*ptr) ) {
00075      s.erase(ptr);
00076      end = s.end();
00077    } else ptr ++;
00078  }
00079 }
00080 /***************************************************************************
00081  * 
00082  * *************************************************************************/
00083 void cftpmod::act() {
00084   vector<cinfodb::ftp_info> users;
00085   vector<cinfodb::ftp_info>::size_type cnt, i;
00086   out<< "<mod><ftp>";
00087  
00088  if( ! idb->ftp_ls( sessb.ai.dom, users) && users.size() ) {
00089    if( env.cgi_rm_get() == cenvironment::rm_post ) {
00090      bool ok= true;
00091      string val, id, user;
00092      vector<cinfodb::ftp_info> torep, torm(users);
00093      vector<cinfodb::ftp_info>::iterator ptr;
00094      cinfodb::ftp_info uitmp;
00095      ostringstream os;
00096      
00097      out<<"<inv>";
00098      // we get list of items
00099      for( cnt=users.size(), i=1; i <= cnt; i++ ) {
00100        os.str("");
00101        os<<i;
00102        if( cgi_var(cgi, "itemid"+os.str(), id) 
00103           && cgi_var(cgi, "itemuser"+os.str(), user) ) {
00104          cgi_var(cgi, "item"+os.str(), val);
00105          
00106          rmspace(user);
00107          if(user.empty()) continue;
00108          rmspace(val);
00109          rmspace(id);
00110 
00111          cmp.id = id;
00112          ptr = find_if(torm.begin(), torm.end(), cmp);
00113          if( ptr == torm.end() ) continue; // not found
00114 
00115          if( ! val.empty() ) {
00116            if ( ptr->dir != val ) {
00117              uitmp.dir = val;
00118              uitmp.id = id;
00119              uitmp.user = user;
00120              torep.push_back(uitmp);
00121            }
00122            torm.erase(ptr);
00123          } else if( val == ptr->dir ) {
00124            torm.erase(ptr);
00125          }
00126        }
00127      }
00128      if( ok ) {
00129        for( i=0, cnt=torep.size(); i<cnt; ++i ) {
00130          if( htmlbad(torep[i].dir, ac_ftp_ok.val_str().c_str(), 
00131                 ac_html_br.val_str().at(0)) ) {
00132            out<<"<dirchars user=\""<< torep[i].user 
00133              <<"\" dir=\""<< torep[i].dir <<"\"/>";
00134          } else if( ! valid(torep[i].dir) ) {
00135            out<<"<dir user=\""<<torep[i].user
00136              <<"\" dir=\""<< torep[i].dir <<"\"/>";
00137          } else if(idb->ftp_rep(sessb.ai.dom, torep[i])) {
00138            err<<"cftpmod::ftp_rep: "<<vq.err_report()<<endl;
00139            out<<"<rep user=\""<<torep[i].user
00140              <<"\" dir=\""<< torep[i].dir <<"\"/>";
00141          }
00142          cmp.id = torep[i].id;
00143          ptr = find_if(users.begin(), users.end(), cmp);
00144          if( ptr != users.end() ) *ptr = torep[i];
00145        }
00146        for( i=0, cnt=torm.size(); i<cnt; ++i ) {
00147          if(idb->ftp_rm(sessb.ai.dom, torm[i].id)) {
00148            err<<"cftpmod::ftp_rm"<<vq.err_report()<<endl;
00149            out<<"<rm user=\""<<torm[i].user
00150              <<"\" dir=\""<< torm[i].dir <<"\"/>";
00151            continue;
00152          }
00153          cmp.id = torm[i].id;
00154          ptr = find_if(users.begin(), users.end(), cmp);
00155          torm[i].dir = "";
00156          if( ptr != users.end() ) *ptr = torm[i];
00157        }
00158      }
00159      out<<"</inv>";
00160    }
00161    for( i=0, cnt = users.size(); i<cnt; ++i )
00162      out<<"<item user=\""<< users[i].user 
00163         <<"\" val=\"" << users[i].dir << "\" id=\""
00164         << users[i].id << "\"/>";
00165  } else out<< "<getcant/>";
00166  out<< "</ftp></mod>";
00167 }
00168 /**************************************************************************
00169  *  
00170  *  ***********************************************************************/
00171 char cftpmod::run() {
00172   if( ! (sessb.ai.flags & cvq::admin) ) return notme;
00173   
00174   cgicc::const_form_iterator fi = cgi.getElement("conf");
00175   if( fi != env.cgi_end_get() ) {
00176     fi = cgi.getElement("id");
00177     if( fi != env.cgi_end_get() && fi->getValue() == _id ) {
00178       idb.reset(cinfodb::alloc());
00179 
00180       act();
00181       return done;
00182     }
00183   }
00184   return notme;
00185 }
00186 
00191 bool cftpmod::valid(const string &dir) {
00192   if( dir[0]=='.' && dir[1] == '.' && dir[2] == '/' ) return false;
00193   string::size_type len = dir.length();
00194   if( dir[len-3] == '/' && dir[len-2] == '.' && dir[len-1] == '.' ) return false;
00195   if( dir.find("/../") != string::npos ) return false;
00196   return true;
00197 }
